name: Seven Deadly Sins: Leyla's Wisdom
description:
Seven Deadly Sins: Leyla's Wisdom is a unique 3d fighting game were you have to make decisions and fight demons that are in the pockets of the astral realm and are spilling through the dimensions. 

You will play as Leyla a little girl who as hard a harsh upbringing but through some mysterious way has gained abilities allowing her to transform and fight demons. It is a game that focuses on the story and combat as getting to the truth will not always be so easy and this game complements that well.  

It will be a cinematic experience with Dark Souls-esque difficulty and gloom. This in tales fighting the main antagonist the Seven deadly sins bosses. Envy, Greed, Gluttony, Lust, Pride, Wrath and Sloth. However in this short storyline you will only entercounter 2 of them. You will go through levels and encounter the sins and their personas which will show a different expression of their archetypes.

Enjoy this wonderful experience and try not to die.           ........ am I dreaming...
